intermediate_steps.tool_input:
{"code": "import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('generated_files/education_dataset.csv')
categories = df[' education'].value_counts()
relative_frequencies = categories / len(df)
max_ratio = relative_frequencies.max()
min_ratio = relative_frequencies.min()
print('Max Ratio:', max_ratio)
print('Min Ratio:', min_ratio)"}

print('Min Ratio:', min_ratio)"}
